name: Bounty of Corruption
description:
A meteor from another planet has landed on Earth, bringing vicious monsters to destroy all humanity. Luckily, you were somehow the only survivor left on the planet, therefore your task is to kill anything that moves. Good luck!

Bounty of Corruption is a Nuclear Throne-inspired procedurally generated arcade shooter.

Features:
  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Collect trophies!
  • "Endless" Mode - Shoot for as long as you can survive!
  • Ultrawide monitor support
  • Shaders - everyone loves shaders (can be turned off)
  • Lots of gore! (can be turned down)
  • Chiptune soundtrack
  • Controller Support1
Controls:

Mouse/KBD: WASD to move and menu, Look with mouse, Click to shoot.
Controller: Dpad or Left Stick to move and menu, Right stick to aim, Right Trigger to shoot.

New Features to Come Soon™
  • Boss battles
  • Split screen co-op
  • More weapons
  • More enemies
  • Bug fixes

1: Tested using Dualshock 3 controller with SCP Toolkit, and should therefore theoretically work 100% with an Xbox 360 controller.
